lines.text: Nothing's in the book, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're literally going to finish off this bag of Jelly Bellies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If an ancient black dragon takes one hit point of damage, it cowers and dies.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm looking for the popcorn ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks to whomever sent these Jelly Bellies, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll end Umbrasyl's turn. That brings us to Pike, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, that's my turn now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy's up, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take just a standard shot with Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. 28 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'll take another shot with Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 does not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second shot just goes wide, firing off into the distance over the city of Westruun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Turn's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be beautiful! Be good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to-- at third. Let me see this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this an attack range thing, or does it automatically--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell attack roll, so you roll--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I add that? That would be a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. Damn, what did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's nice. That'll hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so now I do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 4d6 plus two more d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to do with your turn, or is that it? You want to move?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I'm also going to put a Spiritual Weapon, just a sword again. Can't think of anything right now because I'm nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say right here in this area around Umbrasyl. The magical light sword of Sarenrae once again forges itself underneath Umbrasyl, swings up towards-- Let's see, you did Guiding Bolt at what level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third level. And Spiritual Weapon is second level. So that works. Lasts for a minute. Make a spell attack. Roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 total? The blade swings up and as it strikes against the dragon's armor, sparks of divine energy versus the scales streak, but no damage is done. The blade is unable to strike through the hide. Does that end your turn, Pike? Are you staying where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you add your spell attack bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You going to move, stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Pike's turn, Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to-- Fassbender, slow the fucking dragon down now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, dear god. That's a good question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who has the Fassbender stats?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got it. Slow-- 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. And that's a wisdom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is wisdom. And Fassbender, just slow until the end of tomorrow, just keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a ten plus nine, succeeds in the save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom disadvantage save. I have Cutting Words-ed him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Rolled even higher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question: he'll just keep doing that until I tell him to stop, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but it has to recharge. If it doesn't, he might just start hitting it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll recharge on a five or a six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. With my bonus action, I drink that potion and I'm a tiny Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! With that, you have shrunk down to a small-sized creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Do it, Scanlan, do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think this is the first time I've ever been taller than you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Hey, buddy! I love ya. Let's go in that dragon's gut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't particularly like small people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Do you think Keyleth will think less of me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, action, bonus action. Done

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vax is actually like a few inches shorter than you. You're now towering over him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tousle his hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm like eight inches tall, if that's true! He's so small!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You're like two feet. He's about two and a half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) These are still sharp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so cute!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Heeheehee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, it's your turn, Scanlan. Oh no, Pike, Vax, Keyleth, then it's you. Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh dear god. Okay. I'm going to transmute the earth underneath him. Right? That's what I'm doing? That's part of the plan? So if I can do right underneath Umbrasyl, that would be fabulous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Transmute Rock--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a 120-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and a 40-foot cube in the range. So what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to do the area just directly under Umbrasyl, if I can, so that I'm not sinking the Herd around him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turning what into what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to turn the ground directly underneath Umbrasyl into mud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The only piece of rock is the piece of rock that you put beneath where the chains were there. The area right beneath Umbrasyl is dirt, it's earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I thought it had spread, because it's 40-foot, so I thought it was under Umbrasyl, but I could do something else--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 40-foot cube, part of it would be under Umbrasyl, possibly, but for the placement of where you put that, it's going to be hard for you to do it without it pulling everybody else into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Plan B.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do it still, but it'll probably take some of the Herd with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I go with pillars? Yeah. I'll go with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just do what you're going to do. Ignore the gnome. Go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast Bones of the Earth, which I think I can pop up six pillars around Umbrasyl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, Grog, you want a boost? You want to stand on a rock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you want a boost? Do you want a boost?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Here's what I'm going to do. I want a pillar here, Grog. When you're ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're putting Grog on a pillar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog on a big stone pillar, bam! And then, where's the button? Pike on a pillar over here, bam. Let's go ahead, I'm trying to trap him in here. I want to pin him as these go up, so let's do one here. Can I get whoever that is up on a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. If I'd known you were going to use this spell, I would've brought the pillars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Surprise! We were trying not to tell anyone our plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's good. Now I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We wanted to keep you off-balance, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Umbrasyl's a big fatty so I can't get my laser pointer over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want it? Right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Over here-ish. On the other side of this one. Can I raise a pillar through his wing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not through his wing, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, move that one that you just placed over a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is like a summoning spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it's fine. You get the idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do one up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knock him in the chin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully that contains him a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That finish your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to my little buddy and I say: are you ready for a ride, little man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Come on, big guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go, I yell as loud as I can to Pike to inspire her with my bonus action first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range? Pike is quite far away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't hear me, or it won't work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range, I think it's 60 feet, so yeah. She's too far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, am I within 60 feet of her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yeah, d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I sort of link arms with good old Vax. Actually, I hug him tight because we've gotta be tight together to do this, and I hold up my hand cone and I cast Dimension Door and I'm going to aim right for the belly of the beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I say: This is so fuuuu--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. You are not fully familiar with the physiology of a dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I am not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gave him as much information as I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you did. I would like for you to make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just an intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your ability to ascertain based on what you've seen, your knowledge of the dragon, where possibly in its body its stomach may be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it advantage because I told him where it would be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. 12?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I give him my Luck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just intelligence, right, there's no other--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you add your intelligence modifier to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would add two to that because of your bardic ability. Plus two to any skill check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 14, then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything extra from heroes' feast? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The darkness that hits your eyes upon vanishing doesn't go away as darkness still hits you. All of a sudden, you are plunged into a thick, wet, crushing interior. You have finished your Dimension Door spell. You are in darkness. You are being crushed between what feels like two layers of musculature. Both of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know where each other are. You don't see the other person. There's no sight. You can't hear anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we touching at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. The trajectory of the spell and the unfortunate circumstance put you guys on two different sides of a membrane, and you don't know where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's all-- I'll use my movement to go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are both considered restrained, so your speed becomes zero, attack rolls against you have advantage, you have disadvantage on dexterity saving throws. Also, you suffer eight points of acid damage, reduced to four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's got the other gatestone? I have one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also both currently have no air. At the top of this round, Umbrasyl goes (disgruntled noises).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Suck it, bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will eat all of you!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a two-foot-tall rogue, you motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up first, top of the round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Okay, I'm going to cast Conjure Animals and I'm going to conjure two giant eagles right in front of his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm really hoping we can put more things on the battlefield, guys. I think that would be a cool idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Sorry, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like I don't have enough to concentrate on up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. I don't have two giant eagle miniatures, so we'll say, for the time being, this air elemental is a giant eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll say, with no facetiousness, this is all I ever wanted in my life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be trapped in the spleen of a dragon with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say these are up in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, right in front of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because I've used all the height things for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Conjure Animals is an action, or a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to tell them to attack his eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They get their own--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Own initiative, which I just rolled. What's their dexterity bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold up. Giant eagle, dexterity is 17, plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it would be plus three, that puts them at 11, so they are just above Keyleth and Vax. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then for my bonus action, I'm going to-- I can't cast two spells, even if one's a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As long as it's a level two or lower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. For my bonus action, I'm going to hide a lot? I'm going to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't start the round hidden, so you can't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't still hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have to spend a bonus action to attempt to hide at the end of your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I attempt to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to be a level two rogue to do that as a bonus action on your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But on my boots of haste I can use it to dash, disengage, or hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're using your bonus action-- so your extra action, not your bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, my extra action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that, yes. Go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You vanish into the foliage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Great. Finishing your turn, the Herd now goes. They're going to attempt to put the rest of the chains up to increase the DC of the grapple. There we go. So four more chains get latched on so they're holding. Each chain increases the DC of the grapple. All right. So as they're all holding it down, the five in the back that are going to take attacks on it are going to do so. That's a hit, miss, miss, hit, miss, miss, miss, miss, miss, hit. Three hits. So four damage, five damage, and eight damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, these guys hit real hard. How come they were hitting us so hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the end of that round. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I go into a frenzied rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent. I'm on top of a pillar, and I'm not within striking distance, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hit it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty tall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I would like to use all three of my attacks against his backside, reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These are just regular. They're not great weapon master. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet. So the first one was the crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crit. So go ahead and roll damage on that plus two additional d12s.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. That's a d12. 21 and two additional d12s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, 21 plus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten, 31.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven, so 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next two strikes, roll for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was awful. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, all right. Last one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was also pretty crap. That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay. At the end of its turn it's going to use a legendary action to attempt to wing attack you. It's going to cost its last--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I did not add the necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On all three of them. Three, six, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of eight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Total of eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Expending two of its actions to use a wing attack, it's going to go ahead and start beating its wings as hard as it can, even with the chains amongst it. Each creature within 50 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 23 dexterity saving throw. Make a dex save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I believe I can fly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only one of the party within-- what did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. All right. You take 15 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reduced to...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reduced to eight. Go ahead and make one more dexterity saving throw, just for my own sake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. You are thrust off the pillar, pushed, falling, and hitting the ground, prone on the ground, the pillar remains there. You take an additional eight points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to four, from the impact. But you are knocked prone. The rest of the Herd here, we'll say for the sake of that, they do not save. Oh, man. They are all knocked prone, knocking much of the chains free from their hands as they're thrown onto their backs. Then it is still technically grappled, so it cannot fly half its speed, unfortunately. It does seem to have knocked a majority of the chains off its back. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holding my action until its action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Noja. Noja's going to attempt another Lightning Bolt. It's the best thing he has at the moment. Oh, a natural 20 on the saving throw. Nope. Not bad. 15 points of lightning damage to Umbrasyl. Noja's then going to dart back behind the tree. Ending Noja's turn, it is now Umbrasyl's turn. Umbrasyl is going to go ahead and attempt to break free of the final chains that are there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, with disadvantage. But even so comes out to a 22. (crash) The rest of the chains that were holding Umbrasyl down break free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the trap? Is he out of the trap then, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the trap that's currently holding it in place is part of the whole setup. The trap is what's keeping it there, starting the grapple, and the chains are just there to increase the DC. So with that, the actual metal structure of the trap that held it in place is shattered. You can see pieces of iron go flying, wood splintering in this cloud of dust that is kicked up from the movement of the wings. Currently right now there are still hooks and chains dangling from Umbrasyl, but some of them have broken and most of them are unmanned at the moment. The dragon is going to (wings flapping) go ahead and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I take my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a shot at him at the joint at his wing and I'm going to attempt to ground him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attempt to ground him? Okay, go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, oh my god, right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's taking a photo?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's taking a photo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Photo taken. Ha! Natural 20. It still doesn't necessarily mean he's grounded. It means he has to make a strength saving throw or he's prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So roll the damage first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll damage. Oh yeah. That's double dice, so that's-- 23 points doubled is 46 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus the modifier. So 46 is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 46, yeah, plus the modifier now is 52 points of damage total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That bullet came from the center of the Pacific Ocean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled really well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing. All right, so. Strength saving throw to try and resist the effect. That is a failure. It's going to use one of its legendary actions to automatically succeed, one of its legendary resistances. So succeeds. Rising up from the ground, because of all the guys that are knocked prone--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to pop off a couple more shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You held your action, okay. So you fired, loaded, fired last round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to blow an action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. It's weird to do-- Out of turn action, it is a little strange to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He held his action. That's something you do on your turn as a burst. I'll say, probably have to wait on your actual turn to do that full bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's okay. Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Umbrasyl does rise up about 40 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually going to move back this way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did he never land on the glyph?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He landed in the trap immediately and the trap set off, but he never grabbed the stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was if he landed on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said it was to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we said to lift it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Squeezed in its insides, you guys both feel this heavy contraction within its body as you guys watch this flow of greenish bile spittle begins to fill up and spray out in a line from its mouth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at all those people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they all going to die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything there-- Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The birds were up in the air, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but the stream sprays down, it's not just a single bolt. It vomits it out and it lands over everything. That's how it works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, are you in there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that comes to 15d8 acid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think a lot of those people will be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 81 points of damage to all those guys. They all just dissolve in horrible agony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, you guys, we're going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both of the eagles just screech in pain as they're entirely ruined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, you fucking wastes of space. They didn't even get to fucking go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. That's going to end Umbrasyl the Hope-Devourer's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Hope-Devourer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the full name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So his middle name is The Hope? And his last name is Devourer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Devourer. Married into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's hyphenated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hyphenated, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marriage fucked everything up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, Umbrasyl the Hope and then marriage fucked everything up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just barely misses you. All right, that's going to end Umbrasyl's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. So. I'm going to Guiding Bolt him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're now up on a pillar facing this giant flying dragon. Standing above the rest of the battlefield, your shield up and your Frostbrand to the side, you reach up and grab your holy symbol and go ahead and roll for your Guiding Bolt attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet. He went back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck him up, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Pike. Can you bring him down any?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm rolling what again? Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What level are you casting it at?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many 4th-level spells do you have left now? Because you cast--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have two more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more? Because you cast Death Ward, which is 4th-level, I believe, right? On Scanlan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is that it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The last Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so that's only two you used.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you have how many more left at 4th-level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two. Because the ring gives me one extra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll that. That is going to be 4d-- how much do you get Guiding Bolt damage on that then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 4d6 plus an additional two or three?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At fourth level, that would be seven, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be 7d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I'll also-- never mind. We're good, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're good. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I'm going to move my Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Spiritual Weapon, which is technically on the ground over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm going to move it to the back of his neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is more than 20 feet away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's down there, so it can begin to shift upward in that direction. So we'll say that it's partway floating in midair.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can it get his feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it can't. It's too far away, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, well, it'll start working its way up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be the eagles' turn, but they got dissolved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Matt. Thank you for pointing that back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I like to. I also want to point out that you guys held my dragon to the ground for two rounds and hit it like a goddamn pincushion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll feel better once Scanlan and I have dissolved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will. All right. End of Pike's turn. Vax, you're up first. At the top of your round--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to take the dragon blade and I'm going to as best as I can drag it in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cut the insides of this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, you take eight points of bludgeoning damage as it is crushing you, muscles tensing on the inside are just-- You're in between musculature right now and just being crushed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Probably its sphincter. Now what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are restrained, so go ahead and make your attack at disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it can't very well avoid it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about him being able to actually move and get it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm using the dragon longsword, which I've never used before. It's a plus one sword, so I get what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus one to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be strength, but we've agreed that it can work as finesse for the purposes of a dex bonus, you just can't sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just can't sneak attack. All right. So.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be grateful I'm being--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you want to do, you are the deity here. So this is a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, you pull the blade and it's just unable to cut through this tense muscle and tendon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Use Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what is this? Is this an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's trying from the inside.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast War God's Blessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does War God's Blessing require you to see the creature?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When a creature within 30 feet makes an attack roll-- So, using the Guiding Bolt, you can see shifting somewhere in the body of Umbrasyl-- (laughs) You see this form moving in there. You know, based on what you guys have discussed before-- I hope you discussed this plan before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We discussed it so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a plus ten bonus, is that what it is?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage with the longsword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he doesn't get sneak attack with a long blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But against dragons it does specific damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it does plus 3d6, if I remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me look it up here just to be safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 from the inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 damage from the inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully that cuts me a little breathing room. And a question that only you know, Matthew--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The extra is 3d6, you are correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I within five feet of Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got 15 damage. Am I within, I'd like to use my bonus action to sneak attack if I can, if I'm within five feet. If Scanlan is within five feet of the creature, that's up to you. I don't know. It's crazy circumstance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The reason that you would get sneak attack for having another creature within five feet is because it is harrying and the opponent is distracted--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The heartburn is not distracting it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not enough. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not a lot of threat to Umbrasyl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get a d8 plus your d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I know. I did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you did the additional 3d6?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did, darling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you only got 15?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I only got 15. I would like to use the dagger to cut into him as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Disadvantage on that attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's no good. That's, nah, it's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't even get your dagger out of the sheath. It's too tight in there. You are cutting through muscle, and you feel the body and the muscle just tense based on the reaction of the interior pain. You watch the dragon, but it's still keeping up in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are beginning to suffocate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can hold your breath for a little while here, but just letting you know, there is no airflow. You're not suffocating yet, but you know there is no air to breathe currently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand, Matthew. I'm fucked. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's your turn. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so scared. Okay, hang on. What the hell is the range on that? I'm going to just take a few steps forward, here-ish. Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There-ish, move up a little bit. Just so I can-- Yeah, just ahead of the tree. And I'm going to attempt to cast Earthbind on him. He has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to use its second legendary resistance, succeeds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, I knew it. Well, we've burned off two of his legendary resistances.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I have no idea what the initiative order is, but Fassbender keeps doing Slow until I tell him to do something else, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it recharges. Go ahead and roll a d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two. It does not recharge Slow. Fassbender is too low. Fassbender is just standing there now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. I'm going to turn into an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to take the remaining of my movement to move up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he has 60 feet of movement, but I moved, what, like ten feet earlier, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet of movement? His speed is 60?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. His Earthglide is-- Yes, 30, so he moves up 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Nope. No. Doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 22 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm staying up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn, you take six points of acid damage, reduced to three, as you've found your way into the stomach. He did not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it big in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fairly spacious, but it's all squeezed together right now. It's not a giant, empty void, it's not a giant pocket of air in your stomach, it is a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click, motherfucker, click.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're also holding your breath. You are also submerged in liquid that is dissolving you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can move my arms, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You're still pressed in but you can move your hands, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's good. I'm going to get that rod out and click it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. Pulling out-- This is going to be weird. All right. So you take out the immovable rod and click it and as you release it, it stays there aloft in the center. You have darkvision as a gnome, correct?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so there in this space amongst the murky liquid you can just barely see its shape there and it is held aloft, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're getting somewhere. Is that my movement? Is that my bonus? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's your action to pull it out and click it. Because it's not easy to do in your current circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Okay. Well, I guess that's my action and I guess as a bonus action I can't really do anything. (laughs) I can't inspire anyone because I don't think I can hear-- oh! I'm going to use the earring. Shit. Fuck. I'm going to just start screaming and say: can you hear me, Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear through the earring, (incoherent high-pitched babbling). The air has now escaped your lungs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not drowning yet. That ends your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get advantage on attacking it because of Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. The next attack, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Vax reply?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the Guiding Bolt, because the Guiding Bolt's technically the next attack, it did not give you advantage on the attack, because you're on the inside and you don't actually see the Guiding Bolt. It would go over to the next one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what the fuck's going on, Matt, it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to see, because I just want to know. How far does Grasping Vine go? Do you know, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60 feet? I can tell you super fast. No, 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high in the air is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is 30 feet up right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You technically have a pillar that's 30 feet high adjacent to him that you can anchor it into a pillar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- can it go from the bottom of the pillar up towards him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to. Down here, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to try to grasp onto one of his legs and yank him back down towards the ground. Ooh, which would really hurt with the immovable rod inside of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So using your bonus action, you conjure the vine as your one 4th-level spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have two because I have a pearl of power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. So you would've had to have prepared that in advance. But yes, we'll say you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, I didn't tell you. I should have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should have told me. But we'll say as part of the preparation you did that, okay. So Grasping Vine appears, lashes out from this pillar up at Umbrasyl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The creature has to succeed on a dexterity saving throw or be pulled-- what's the DC on your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. That is a nine plus nine, that is 18. So the vine whips out and Umbrasyl backs up and pulls the leg up and it just hits the air beneath. Kicks away the vine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to attack him three times with my hasting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Yeah, three attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one has advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And that's sneak attack, because he's got somebody close to him. Inside of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's technically not sneak attack. It's not so much about-- there's somebody close, but a person that is not threatening him from his current physical space, it is a bit of heartburn for him right now. You don't sneak attack somebody from eating bad pasta.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Then just seven--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet, no. So how much damage is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage for the first attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack? This does not have advantage, only the first one did. What was your first roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then it doesn't hit. Then 26 for the last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits, so the first one hits, sticks part in the front of its armor, doesn't seem to phase it, the second one it actually hits the wing and the wing just shatters it and knocks it out of the air as it's keeping itself up. The third one, however, does strike and hit and it'll actually go between the scales of the neck. Roll for damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. Both arrows sticking out of the hardened exterior of the ancient black dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Grasping Vine just still hangs out there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As long as you maintain concentration, it'll stay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it grabbing him or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It failed with the grab. All right. End of your turn? Is that what you're doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I hiding still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to use a bonus action to try and hide if you began the turn hiding. Or you can use your extra action from the haste to do it, but you already used it to attack, so you're not hidden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh! Fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) End of your turn, it's going to use another legendary action to do another tail attack against you, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the third one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural one. Umbrasyl goes to swing and suddenly there's a pulse in the stomach as you see Vax moving once again on the inside and doing so distracts it and the tail just swings overhead and you duck below it as it just barely misses your head by inches. One of your braids actually comes loose from the amount of wind that blows by. That brings us to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's left of the Herd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Herd's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, goliaths and Herd, please roll better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to rush up around here. Grab the chains that they can. The chains have broken, so they're going to go ahead as part of their plan to begin to just unleash weaponry, so they just run through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have they all broken? Maybe some just came loose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was their plan. The plan they agreed to. They're all taking out javelins now. They had them at their side. They're all leaping up towards it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they just the stupidest goliaths, that they're all clumping together again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's redundant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These guys are dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've met...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scholars, the lot. You're going to pay for that later, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hit. Three hits. And so they're all just (effort sounds) chucking these javelins upward. Four, eight, that's 12, plus seven-- 19 points of damage from the javelins as some stick in then fall out, the wounds are now becoming visible. Umbrasyl's-- there's visible wounding but doesn't appear to be in dire straits or anything. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I have two questions. One of the things I picked up from Kevdak were four enchanted javelins. What do those do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're thrown, ranged attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they're just enchanted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're plus one to hit and damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it, yeah. It's a relatively simple enchantment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is my climbing speed? If my natural speed is 50 and I wanted to climb that column, what's the climbing speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Climbing speed? I mean, if you roll a decent climb check-- here. That would be-- I'd say that would be an athletics check to see if you can climb it, and I'd put it at about half speed. But you're also prone, so getting up from that's half your speed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On my back, can I use my bonus action to drink the potion of speed, which makes me hasted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you can. You now have technically four attacks per round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. And it doubles my speed, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so I have 100 feet, so can I stand up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. 50 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and climb that column towards Umbrasyl's feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not awesome. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You just manage to get to the top with the last bit of your movement. So you are up about ten feet from Umbrasyl right now, pushing on 15 at an angle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I have four attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You're not in melee, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so I'll use three of the enchanted javelins and the javelin of lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you (effort sounds) finally with the javelin of lightning. So go ahead and make the first three strikes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on the javelin strikes, I'm just going to pull it up real fast, since this is the first time you've used this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's 120 feet for the javelin of lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, within 30-foot range, so it's fine. Go ahead and roll. First one is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an 11 plus-- just my natural like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 11 plus one for being enchanted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your strength modifier and your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, my proficiency--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is plus seven, I believe. Plus-- so yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Where's my proficiency-- oh five, I got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're looking at plus 13 with these attacks. The first one hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Third one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. The lightning javelin you just throw and I think it hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the second one, the last one is a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one, I don't think you actually roll to hit with the javelin, it just becomes a bolt of lightning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 1d6 plus eight for damage on two of those javelins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And now with the javelin of lightning. Makes its save. That is a 21 with the save. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, so it takes the half damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the damage on it total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll that and he takes half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, all righty. So 13, and then halved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of lightning damage. Okay. The last hit, the javelin turns into a bolt of lightning, and streaks through, hits and impacts and then just falls to the ground, the energy expended. Jamming itself into the dirt not far from the ground. End of your turn, Grog. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, my first shot, taking a wing shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 20, that does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. It just ricochets off the armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's one grit. Taking another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, reload, and then shot again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits. 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15 points of damage. And he has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength saving throw. That is a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it succeeds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It succeeds on the 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have to meet or exceed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to burn an action surge to take a third shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So reload, shot, reload. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 21 does not hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 does not hit. It just steers wide, shooting past the beating wings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and then I'm going to just hide behind that tree and wait for my next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Noja is going to use the third and final Lightning Bolt, now arcing up to the entity. Makes its save with a 27. All right, bringing us to-- 8d6. 13 points of lightning damage against Umbrasyl from Noja, and Noja steps back behind, looking exasperated and spent on some of the upper-echelon spells at his disposal. Now it comes to-- actually, at the end of Noja's turn, Umbrasyl's going to use its last legendary action to make one more tail swipe at you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 29 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 11 points of bludgeoning damage reduced to five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's happening over there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Top of Umbrasyl's turn. See if this recharges. Umbrasyl is going to attempt to move to the left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, try it, buddy. Internal damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The rod supports 8,000 pounds of pressure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. If the creature pushes against it, it must make a DC 30 strength check to move the rod up to ten feet in a single round. So. Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That thing's fixed in space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes to move and (grunts) and is feeling something tear through on the inside of its area so it stops with this sharp pain. Takes one point of damage, but the warning is there. It does not move. However, (laughs) the acid breath did recharge on a five. It's going to go ahead and go right there. Angrily lay down right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you're resistant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't he having plummeting issues if he's not moving?
