lines.text: No, if your speed is zero you plummet is how it works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wrecked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Zanror?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zanror's right there at the bottom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's his wife?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His wife is over here. And when I say wrecked, they're on the ground, their flesh dissolving and screaming in pain. The Herd has been heavily culled in but a few rounds. There's a little bit of horror to it. I need both Grog and Keyleth as an earth elemental to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a natural one. Rolled a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both suffer 82 points of acid damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Resistance, so I halve that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take 41 points of acid damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in tank mode, so I'm good. I'm an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am going to cast Blindness on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on the check? What is it, is it wisdom?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's constitution. Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, constitution saving throw. That is 18 plus 14. 32. I think that succeeds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know. She might've rolled a 78.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't know! That's fine. I'm going to move my Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So it now shifts up into space as a bonus action, and you can make a ranged spell attack against it as the sword arcs upward towards Umbrasyl. Go ahead and roll, add your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage. 1d8 plus five, correct? Pretty sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 1d8 for every two slot levels--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did second level for that one, because it was a bonus action. 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blade just streaks across and more sparks fly, but this time you can see it left a carve of glowing red mark across the scales where the blade managed to do some damage to it. That ends your turn, Pike. Vax, you're up. You immediately take eight points of bludgeoning damage as it begins to crush you from the inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my bonus action to-- can I sneak attack this thing from inside? I'm inside him! That's very surprising!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's different! It's not like a soft gooey center. All of its body is still very dense, sinewy muscle in the vicinity. You don't know where you are in its body, so you don't know where the actual weak points are. So, given those circumstances, your ability to barely move-- Probably not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably not? All right. Well. I'm going to use my bonus action first to hit it. It's at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. All attacks because you're still restrained.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is 19, which fucks up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That unfortunately is not cutting through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. That's a 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, just barely not able to cut through the dense hide, the blade is caught on what feels like a ligament or something, it can't quite carve through with your body all crushed up inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. I will, for my turn, suffocate and also Fassbender should still be trying to recharge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So go ahead and roll a d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: d6. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. As an earth elemental I want to drop into the earth and Earthglide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How many feet are you going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my 60 feet-- question, can I get across and to the top of this pillar here? Maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get up to there. You're wider than the pillar, though. You like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earthglide to the top, so it's 30 feet tall. (nervous laughter) And I'm going to use my momentum to see if I can rocket myself out and see if I can jump and grab onto his leg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're making this a jump action, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to shoot out of the pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the momentum of the Earthglide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And shoot out with a waterslide trajectory, woo! Yeah? Maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say that-- It's pretty fast-- Also pretty heavy as an earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm thinking about it real hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So is that strength as a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be strength as an earth elemental if you do not have a specific skill for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good. 18 plus five, so, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not halting or doing anything to Umbrasyl other than the fact that you're holding on to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I've got his foot. And I'm heavy as fuck. Well, if Fassbender weighs, what was it, like 1,200 pounds? 2,800 pounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A ton is 1,000 pounds. Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 2,000 pounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought a ton was 3,000 pounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: None of us fucking know. Why didn't we go metric?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The European watchers are like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm holding on for dear life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know from my experience going to the pubs with Grog--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take eight points of acid damage, by the way, as you're slowly dissolving. Reduced to four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine. How's my lungs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh Keyleth, by the way, I need you to make a concentration check before I forget.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. No, that's. Wait, do I add anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well the DC is half the damage you took from the breath weapon, so 40. So who did you cast the resist acid on? You're no longer resistant to acid, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it came in handy for the one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's my lungs? Am I dying here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your air is out, you're still holding your breath, per se, but you have one more round before you actually probably start--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to say that Liam O'Brien, who's a total wuss-puss, can hold his breath for like 50 seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While you're screaming?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Vax and Scanlan should be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing okay. He screamed and released all the air out of his lungs. So he's now completely collapsed lungs, no air to subsist on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm almost out. I'm going to see if I can last one more round in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you doing? (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, as I was saying, I know from my time drinking with Grog that any sort of blow to the stomach will really make you barf pretty easily, so I'm going to set off a Thunderwave at level six and hope that he spits me up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Spits you both up, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still in its anus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even know where you are, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're done, friend, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so at a sixth level we're looking at 7d8 thunder damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Thunder damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need more d8s?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All part of the plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is totally thought-out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hastily smushed-together plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a DC, it rolled a nine plus 14, so it succeeds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it'll be halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eat some shit, Umbrasyl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only 12 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points. I need you to make a constitution saving throw, because you are on the other side of the membrane from Scanlan and suddenly there's a giant impactful forceful blow as the outside of the stomach crushes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of damage as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Okay, I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw on Umbrasyl's part for-- Rolled a natural 20, so Umbrasyl's not vomiting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not vomiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, rolled a natural 20 to see if it could hold it down. There's a boof from the inside of the dragon--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does a little come up and he swallows it back down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically. A little, almost.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you got a little air though. For you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, did that make a little air?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably give you enough time to (inhales).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, is that your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do much else. Do I have any movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are restrained so your movement is zero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even in the water? I'm in a womb-like state.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember the scene in Akira when Tetsuo gets too big and the girl gets crushed briefly? You're in that middle period right there, you're between two folds of stomach lining and there is just acid all around. It's awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Then I can't really do much. Oh! Shit. No, I would've had to call it earlier. Never mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to remind everyone, I am really small. I fit between muscles, bones, ligaments, anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could have done Cutting Words after I cast my spell, but I didn't, so forget it. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, it's going to use a legendary action to do a wing attack, actually two actions cost. Begins beating its wings rapidly in this vicinity. I need both Grog and Pike to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, we're safe from all this shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! This is the best place to be. We're only going to suffocate and be crushed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you take 15 points of bludgeoning damage and are thrust towards the edge of the stone, I need you both to make strength checks to resist the force to the blow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on! Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is 15 halved for me for the bludgeoning, or is that already halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's halved for you after that. However, you both are, from the sheer force of the wind, blown off the top--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you have to beat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Ancient dragon. You both fall and take an additional eight points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to use my celestial shield and cast Featherfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you take no damage from the additional seven. You catch yourself on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My eight is halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're both prone at the bottom of the pillars. All right. That was the end of Scanlan's turn. Back to the top, Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Conjure Animals, again, two more giant eagles out of the ether. This time I want to conjure them like ten feet above his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Actually, because I didn't see you I need you to go ahead and make a save as well, because you were on it as it's beating its wings, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even though I'm holding on to his leg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. You also take 15 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Halved because I'm an elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I need you to go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You are blown off of the dragon's body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a rock slamming into the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she knocked out a pillar on the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of bludgeoning damage from the impact with the ground, leaving a small crater. However, there are two giant eagles that are now floating in the vicinity around the dragon. The eagles are summoned. Their initiative is not bad. They're going to be after Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So they're above his head now, so if he shoots acid down, they'll be here. And their command is, attack his eyeballs. Okay. I'm going to use my boots of haste. For my perception, would I be able to see any weird little bumps on the dragon? Because my brother's been in there a while. Can I see anything going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm behind his left nipple. It's pretty good already. It's pretty good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our earrings should work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't need to talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28. No, 29 perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29? All right. You notice, on the outskirts of like the central row of scales, there is a small lump that is constantly struggling not far from the surface and is just darting around like a cartoon flea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to aim right by there. But not quite at it. I want to make an opening around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, remember when we used to do hopscotch? That was the best. And then also we used to take baths together when we were really little, but that was when we were really little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20. Doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, it hits and shatters--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I use War God's Blessing again? I use it every turn. Every round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's a Channel Divinity, in which case I don't think you can. War God's Blessing, Channel Divinity-- Which currently-- You can use it a second time between rests. Yeah. So you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten to the attack, so it hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex'ahlia--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see here, what's the range on that one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's consulting the book again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just checking to see the range on that last because it does have a range--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's getting my hopes up and then he's going to dash them down to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what I do. Creature within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll, so you could not, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was that, say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has to be within 30 feet of you. She's too far away. So that one does miss, shatters across the armor of the dragon. You have one more attack and then your extra if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one doesn't work either. (mock-crying) Okay, that's good. 23!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's dead!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do I want to do this? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't summon it yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dammit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sticks into and pierces through. You feel a (impact sound) nearby. And what little bit of vision you have in the squeezed area, dark as it is using your elven darkvision, you can see what looks to be a part of an arrow point that has stuck through the armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wrap my fingers around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ends Vex's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know if it's Vex's. It could be anybody's!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut the fuck up, gnome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all the way. Take a step back and make four arrow shots at it. That's a hit, a miss, a miss, and a miss. Takes an additional ten points of damage from the arrow. That guy over there is going to move around and he's going to grab one of the dropped chains on the ground and throw it up to see if it can wrap around Umbrasyl. Seven does not hit. It just arcs below and falls to the ground. That's going to end the Herd's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still hasted. Can I stand up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 50 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How tall am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are twice your size, so you're pushing about 12 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's only six feet tall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's gotta be taller than six feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly half your height, not perfect--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're 15 feet tall now, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 20 feet, you're probably 20 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 sounds nicer. Rounds up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't argue with the DM.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not arguing, we're rounding up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're like two feet tall now and it's really impressive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Being that I'm hasted, can I move directly behind Umbrasyl, like underneath him and behind? And can I attach the chain of returning to the Bloodaxe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assume it was attached before the battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. And can I throw it at Umbrasyl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have four? No, I just have one throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one throw. It hits and then you can pull it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's even better. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21. With one point of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage onto Umbrasyl. All righty. It is embedded in there. Do you want to pull back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to pull it loose. I just want to weigh on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you weigh. All right. At the end of your turn, it's going to go ahead and make a tail attack against one of the eagles. That is going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant eagle takes 20 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure that probably kills him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has 26 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got six points left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the eagle right there has six hit points left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does enlarging do anything to my damage? Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do an additional 1d4 damage with any melee attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't do that. Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Melee attacks. Although the weapon does grow large. I'll say go ahead and do another 1d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So that's an additional four damage. Great. So that's the eagles' turn. What do you got, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to fly and attack his eyeballs! Fuck him up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll attack, they have two attacks each, so roll four attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll four attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Plus five to each.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That one hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. That hits. That one doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Then one other attack hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two hits. All right. So that is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So those would be, like, one beak and one talon maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be one beak and one talon, yeah. Go for it. So 1d6 plus three and then 2d6 plus three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine for one on the eyeballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And eight on the talons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not bad. Both streaking out and clawing heavily at the dragon. It's bothered by it very remotely. It's more distracted with the sharp pain in its stomach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eyeballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well yeah, I mean, they're striking at it, they don't go straight for the eyeballs, the dragon goes here, hit. They're getting near it and scraping it, the scales around it, it's moving its horns around and batting them away. If you wanted to make called shots for its eyes specifically, none of those would've hit. Outside of a natural 20, none of them would've hit. And even a dragon's eyes have pretty decent armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's cool, okay, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percy, you're up. Oh, we've lost audio on Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Text us your move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm taking two shots. That's all I got left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we go. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah! Hm. Ah. Okay. That's, eee, (broken audio).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say that again, Perce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20, 24 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six of which are necrotic. I'm taking my second shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Reload, second shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reload, fire. Fuck my life. That's m--(audio glitches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misfire? Oh no. Bad News just (muffled explosion).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Putting it away, pulling out the other gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's the end of your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Umbrasyl is going to look around in the vicinity, you know, starting to show some wear and tear and some serious damage to it now. And it's going to go into a dive. As it does so, you watch as the rod hits the edge of the body and tears through the stomach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And tears through the abdomen and out the side of it. The immovable rod now shoots out the side of its body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's going to be a lot of damage, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a fuckin' missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 37 points of piercing damage as it ejects from the side. He is going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still attached to him, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. As you are pulled up, let's see here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going for a ride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We burned through all of his legendary saves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're attached to him? By a chain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, Grog, are now being lifted up. Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage on this. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, yeah. Umbrasyl lifts up and goes full flying speed of 80 feet this way, carrying you dangling beneath and is going to go into a dash and continue to fly up towards Gatshadow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (terrified laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Scanlan and Vax inside him still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Work that broom, girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's midnight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three of us are not here next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of you are not here-- That's right. Do you guys want to keep going then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's either that or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you're going to have to wait two weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you guys think? Would you rather wait two weeks?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, this is you guys, too. You guys have to stay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to go, keep going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be a long night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's not here next week?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura, Travis, and Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're probably going to take off next week because we're missing half the party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so we'll just skip next week and come back in two weeks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's on us, because we have jobs and getting up in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we have work tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we skip next week and come back in two weeks to finish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that's smarter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, let's do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're leaving me in this thing's anus for two weeks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That 30 minutes fucked us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is awful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The worst cliffhanger ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have the remnants of the Herd and most of Vox Machina left behind as Umbrasyl flies off to the peaks of Gatshadow, dragging a large chain-held Grog beneath and a miniaturized Vax and Scanlan inside of its body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm holding an arrow that's half in and out of the dragon. So I've got a little tunnel out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a little breathing hole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see a hole that goes to the outside now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the shaft of an arrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is chaos. I will see you guys later. I can't hear anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye, Taliesin! We love you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man, this is going to get real interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to survive two weeks thinking about this? I know what we'll do! We'll subscribe to Loot Crate and we'll find all sorts of things to keep us-- We'll be able to play with new toys and drink from-- (laughing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Made me drop my fucking jelly bean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That went south. That went seriously south.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not doing well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're doing great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys did pretty good. Dragon's taken some damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it two Thursdays from now yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might be another Q&A hangout session for those of us who are still in town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a b.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why are you guys going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still going to be in Puerto Rico that long? No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. We'll be back here in two weeks, back here next week for probably a Q&A hangout session, two weeks from now with the dramatic conclusion of the showdown with Umbrasyl the Hope Devourer, member of the Chroma Conclave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, if you were wondering what to get me for my birthday, it's to kill my character in two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! That is so terrible. Don't say that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's awful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a death wish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hope Devourer. Maiden name Hope. Maiden name Hope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dragon's name is Hope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you in a few weeks? Well, some of us will see you next week. Rest well, dream of flying dragons digesting smaller people. (laughs) See you guys soon. Is it Thursday yet? Good night.
